metadata.title: USN-3081-1 -- Tomcat vulnerability
metadata.description: Dawid Golunski discovered that the Tomcat init script incorrectly handled creating log files. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to  obtain root privileges. (CVE-2016-1240)  This update also reverts a change in behaviour introduced in USN-3024-1 by setting mapperContextRootRedirectEnabled to True by default.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3081-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  tomcat7-common - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.7 libservlet3.0-java - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.7 tomcat7-docs - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.7 libservlet3.0-java-doc - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.7 tomcat7 - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.7 libtomcat7-java - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.7 tomcat7-user - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.7 tomcat7-admin - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.7 tomcat7-examples - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.7 No subscription required
